scripts.start: npm run pug_tmp && npm run serve
scripts.pug_tmp: pug --client components/modal/modal.pug --extension pug.js --name modal_tmp && pug --client components/chat/chat.pug --extension pug.js --name chat_tmp && pug --client components/chat-wrapper/wrapper.pug --extension pug.js --name wrapper_tmp && pug --client components/form/form.pug --extension pug.js --name form_tmp && pug --client components/user/user.pug --extension pug.js --name user_tmp
